BEFORE:
conditions = ' & '.join([_condition_to_logic(f,v) for (f,v) in self._conditions])
        s = ('%s->%s if %s' % (
            self.original_tag,
            self.replacement_tag,
            conditions))
AFTER:
conditions = ' & '.join([_condition_to_logic(f, v) for (f, v) in self._conditions])
        s = '{0}->{1} if {2}'.format(
            self.original_tag,
            self.replacement_tag,
            conditions
        )
